Question: inQs Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
inQs Co., Ltd.

Product: SQPV Glass

 - Sustainable power generation technology
 - Winner of the "Best of Innovation" award at CES 2024
 - Recognized in two additional innovation categories at CES 2024
 - Part of Smart Cities product category
 - Developed in collaboration with IFTL and supported by the NTT Group
